title: This Is the Gospel Week 2 with Dr. Don Payne
description:
For Week 2 of This Is the Gospel, Raechel and Amanda are joined by Dr. Don Payne, professor and dean at Denver Seminary. Picking up after last week’s reflection about creation and humanity’s fall into sin, the three discuss the hope of our redemption and restoration that is only possible through the person and work of Jesus. Join in as we reflect on the comprehensive salvation we have in the life, death, resurrection, and ascension of Christ. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Gospel reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the Gospel collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-gospel-week-2-with-dr-don-payne
